entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Area - Outlining #76248
  • Area - Remove Unused Member #76247
  • Area - Simplify Interpolation #76246
  • Area - Toggle Comment #76245
  • Area - Order Modifiers #76244
  • Area - Workspace Public APIs #76243
  • Text Editor does not Center when I select a Method in Document Outline Window #76242
  • Parameter Info stops working after pressing Ctrl+Shift+Space in a particular function call #76241
  • Test plan for "string literals in data section as utf8" #76234
    .NET 10
  • C# Methods are not colored #76232

Closed

  • Region position bug for #if & #elif #58895
    Backlog
  • List pattern is not correctly formatted in the first case of a switch expression #72196
    Backlog
  • CSharpDecompiledSourceService.PerformDecompilation may throw FileNotFoundException #45801
    Backlog
  • Avoid unnecessary casts when refactoring #39116
    Backlog
  • C#: Naming rule violation with camelCase formatting applied will conflict with static void Main() method inside classes. #36385
    Backlog
  • Cref: constructor overload parameter list differences are disregarded in VB #34104
    Backlog
  • Display the analyzers and extensions causing "Gathering suggestions" to block #29530
    Backlog
  • Introduce Local: multiple unnecessary casts generated and also not grayed out #24853
    Backlog
  • Avoid using Document snapshot in perf-sensitive command handlers #57554
    Backlog
  • CTRL + click (and F12) on a partial property should always jump to user-defined part #76156
  • "Go to Definition" crashes with `BadImageFormatException` for `System.Net.IPEndPoint` #75118
    17.13
  • Implement interfaces code fix does not implement protected interface members non-explicitly #72380
    Backlog
  • "Implement abstract class" should add the right generic constraint when a parameter is covariant in T? and constrained to be a subtype #71225
    Backlog
  • Extract Interface / Pull Up should remove [Enumeratorancellation] attributes #71718
    Backlog
  • "Extract Interface" refactoring doesn't offer to add static members to the interface #54019
    Backlog
  • Refactoring ""Extract Method" when a primary constructor property is in the extracted code sends primary constructor property in as a method parameter #73580
    Backlog
  • The "Extract method" refactoring should recognize primary constructor parameters #73044
    Backlog
  • Find All References does not support using statements #34107
    Backlog
  • Find all references to `dynamic` does not work #75800
    17.13
  • Find All References finds nothing for indexers declared outside the solution #31819
    Backlog
  • csharp_style_var_when_type_is_apparent breaks when awaiting a generic type #64902
    Backlog
  • CS4033 creates invalid code on partial methods #63404
    Backlog
  • Clone of Test_IndexerWithNoRequiredParameters for params collections fails #72227
    Backlog
  • Introduce local variable gets nullability wrong #69335
    Backlog
  • Make "Introduce a local variable" work with top-level statements #67270
    Backlog
  • Introduce local mangles formatting #47277
    Backlog
  • ExtractLocal crash when fixing all #23297
    Backlog
  • 'Introduce local for x' changes code and introduces errors #25838
    Backlog
  • CodeLens popup is empty 17.6.2 #68548
  • `Replace 'Property' with method` erases DIM #75999
    Backlog
  • Summary Xml-Doc actively breaks code #75838
    17.13
  • `Use language keywords` does not work for `nint` and `nuint` when targeting `net4.8.1` using `LangVersion` 9.0 or higher #74973
    Backlog
  • Replace 'xxx' with method has bug #75186
    17.13
  • IDE0078: Code Cleanup applied IDE0078 and broke the code #75122
    17.13
  • Clone of UnwrapParamsArray fpr params collections #72225
    17.13

PullRequests

Created

  • Skip CSharpWinForms.DeleteControl on 32 bit release #76239
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix go-to-def on an abstract explicit impl of an interface method #76238
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Check ref safety of arg mixing in collection initializers #76237
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add Color Scheme support for VS 2022 tinted themes. #76233
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required

Merged

  • Don't place 'async' after 'partial' modifier #76168
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Support static members in extract interface #76151
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update FAR and Go to Def to work on indexers #76220
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix NFW thrown when refreshing source generated files #76240
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Keep member bodies when converting DIM property to method #76186
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Use new championed proposal and test plan for "extensions" feature #76131
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Feature - Extension Everything, Next
  • Fix override implementation with generics and constraints #76223
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update find-refs to find references to Dispose in a using-statement #76221
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix equivalence check for nint/IntPtr #76231
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add support for 'find refs' finding references to 'dynamic' #76118
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Enable CA1052 (static holder types should be static) #65830
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, VSCode, Next
  • Support implementing protected members in implement interface #76178
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • VBOverloadResolutionPriority: clone remaining C# tests for the feature #76127
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Do not treat Task.Run methods as 'apparent' for 'use var' #76229
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Support introduce variable at the top level #76218
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix switch indentation for list patterns #75953
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix incorrect codespit of xml doc comments #76108
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Support nint/intptr conversion on c# 11 and up #76181
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Have go-to-def flip between partial definition and implementation #76187
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update Copilot rename telemetry #76045
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Do not duplicate directives when converting from property to methods #76184
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Catch expected exception when reading info out of a PDB #76182
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • fix flaky lsp diagnostic test #76228
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Disable 'use pattern matching' when eliding multiple calls that pass by ref #76183
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not pass primary constructor parameters explicit when extracting methods #76179
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update suggestion mode provider to support params collections #76177
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Filter out certain compiler attributes when extracting an interface #76176
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Onboard C# advanced pages to unified settings #75493
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move off of specialized task methods #76149
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Restrict some types in object initializer setters when not directly settable #75507
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix primary ctor param in static context #74580
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Threading fixes #76230
    Area-Compilers
  • Update the Copilot powered Inline Rename UX #76001
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support modifiers with simple lambda parameters. #75400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve parsing recovery with 'file' keyword #76185
    Area-Compilers, Feature - File-Local Types, VSCode
  • Add spec for the data section string literals feature flag #76139
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • avoid ITextSnapshotLine.GetText() #76133
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix reference finding for tuple fields and anonymous type properties #69804
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Consider RefSafetyRules with UnscopedRef #75930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add feature flag for emitting string literals into data section as UTF8 #76036
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Close stale PRs #75963
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Razor DynamicFile Provider #76050
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix issue where structure tag could get stuck at the wrong location #76194
    Area-IDE, untriaged
